title: Parcels â€“ Active and Retired
description: Note 3/13/2024: This data pipeline was recently updated. If you notice any issues, please email support@datasf.org, or fill out the form located at Actions->Contact dataset owner. Recorded parcel geography, both active and retired, with date recorded parcel was added, date recorded parcel was dropped/retired, date was added, dropped or altered re map layer. Contains geography created since the inception of the basemap in 1995, with some exceptions. Zoning District columns reflect current zoning, which can be found here: https://data.sfgov.org/d/xvjh-uu28

columns.name: mapblklot
columns.description: For parcels that are condominium lots and share the same 2D space, this is the lowest value  Assessor Parcel Number in the set.

columns.name: blklot
columns.description: Unique Assessor Parcel Number, combination of the Block Number and the Lot Number

columns.name: block_num
columns.description: Assessor Block Number

columns.name: lot_num
columns.description: Assessor Lot Number

columns.name: from_address_num
columns.description: From Address Number, i.e., the lowest address house number

columns.name: to_address_num
columns.description: To Address Number, i.e., the highest address house number

columns.name: street_name
columns.description: Street Name

columns.name: street_type
columns.description: Street Type, or suffix (e.g., ST, BLVD, etc.)

columns.name: odd_even
columns.description: Odd or Even Address Number Range

columns.name: in_asr_secured_roll
columns.description: Indicates the record is in the current Assessor Secured Roll

columns.name: pw_recorded_map
columns.description: Indicates the record is part of the current Public Works basemap dataset, based on  recorded map information.

columns.name: zoning_code
columns.description: Zoning Code - based on City Planning data

columns.name: zoning_district
columns.description: Zoning District Name - based on City Planning data

columns.name: date_rec_add
columns.description: This is the date that the documents related the to addition of the parcel was recorded, as tracked by Public Works.

columns.name: date_rec_drop
columns.description: This is the date that the documents related the to dropping/retiring of the parcel was recorded, as tracked by Public Works.

columns.name: date_map_add
columns.description: This is the date that Public Works adding the parcel geography.

columns.name: date_map_drop
columns.description: This is the date that Public Works dropped the parcel geography.

columns.name: date_map_alt
columns.description: This is the date that Public Works altered the parcel geography.

columns.name: project_id_add
columns.description: This is the project identifier for the Public Works project related to the addition of the parcel.

columns.name: project_id_drop
columns.description: This is the project identifier for the Public Works project related to the dropping/retiring of the parcel.

columns.name: project_id_alt
columns.description: This is the project identifier for the Public Works project related to the altering of the parcel.

columns.name: shape
columns.description: The geometry, multipolygon format

columns.name: centroid_latitude
columns.description: The centroid latitude of the parcel

columns.name: centroid_longitude
columns.description: The centroid longitude of the parcel

columns.name: supdist
columns.description: Full name of Supervisorial District.

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: Supervisor District Number

columns.name: supdistpad
columns.description: Supervisor District Number with zero padding (01,02,...)

columns.name: numbertext
columns.description: Supervisor District Number as text (ONE, TWO, ...)

columns.name: supname
columns.description: Name of current Supervisor of District.

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: San Francisco Neighborhood for analysis, per DataSF.

columns.name: police_district
columns.description: The corresponding SFPD district.

columns.name: police_company
columns.description: The corresponding SFPD district company.

columns.name: planning_district
columns.description: These are grouping of census tracts. Planning Districts are used in various areas of the Planning process, mainly for analysis and management but are also in some parts of the General Plan.

columns.name: planning_district_number
columns.description: The number corresponding Planning District field.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was last updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded to the open data portal
